amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part C of House Report 117-333 to establish a new unit at Federal Trade Commission devoted to protecting public interest by monitoring fuel markets to facilitate transparent and competitive market practices.
amendment.purpose: Amendment establishes a new unit at Federal Trade Commission devoted to protecting public interest by monitoring fuel markets to facilitate transparent and competitive market practices.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pappas amendment (A003) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 214 - 207 (Roll no. 230).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A003) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Pappas.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Pappas amendment (A003) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 214 - 207 (Roll no. 230).
